eat and drink well, commune with your friends, connect with your business, and indulge yourself. Clasico is located at the corner of Main and Palm Avenue has been a long-time gathering spot for Sarasotans and tourists. Unpretentious, yet interesting and delightful at the same time, their Contemporary American cuisine, full bar, and dinner/late night offerings will be sure to satisfy. Clasico has a menu of comfort food with a healthy twist. Lunch begins at 11:30 AM. Hungry after hours? Try their amazing late-night fare, so from 11 p.m. to close. Luxurious outdoor seating with the best view of downtown Sarasota will be the perfect landing for an afternoon coffee. Host your next private event in style at Clasico Italian Chophouse, where elegance meets exceptional cuisine. Whether you‚Äôre celebrating a milestone birthday, organizing a corporate gathering, or hosting a special family dinner, their dedicated team ensures an unforgettable experience tailored to your needs. Indulge in their sumptuous Italian-inspired dishes expertly crafted with the finest ingredients, paired with an extensive selection of wines and cocktails. Their sophisticated ambiance and impeccable service provide the perfect backdrop for your event, creating memories that will last a lifetime. Contact them today to book your private event and let them elevate your occasion at Clasico Italian Chophouse. Welcome to the best corner in Sarasota. Customer Reviews: ‚ÄúWe had an excellent experience dining here for an early dinner. The place was nicely decorated and had a great ambiance. We had made a reservation and were seated immediately. Drinks were ordered and arrived quickly. They were also very accommodating with some special requests we had with our baby. We started off by ordering a small plate of meatballs, as well as a wedge salad. They were delicious. The entrees we ordered were the bolognese, chicken Parmesan, pork chop and chicken pesto pasta. Everything was fantastic! Even the kids pizza was large and tasty. Our entire party enjoyed all of the food and had no complaints at all. The service was excellent throughout. We can‚Äôt wait to go back and would definitely recommend Clasico for a wonderful meal!‚Äù ‚Äì Tee O. ‚ÄúWe had the most amazing dinner at Clasico last night. Our server, Jade, was EXCELLENT. She was so kind, so engaged, and even got us a champagne toast to celebrate our bride-to-be. The hosts were very gracious as well, accommodating our table change. The food was so good, I had the steak tips Gorgonzola gnocchi which was absolutely incredible. I would go back for just that dish. Drinks, food, and service were all superb. Can‚Äôt recommend it enough!‚Äù ‚Äì Valerie and Jaden Robideau ‚ÄúThis is a regular stop for us, we love the food and the service is great. My favorite is the salmon, cooked medium to perfection and served over asparagus and mashed potatoes but I ordered it with the lemon risotto instead, it has great flavor. My husband enjoys their bucatini and meatballs. The inside is warm, comfortable and inviting and the outside seating provides the feeling of being seated on the streets of Italy due to the foliage and people passing by.‚Äù ‚Äì Michelle S. Learn more about Clasico Italian Chophouse Price $$ Ambience Casual, Classy Hours Monday-Tuesday: 11AM-11PM Wednesday-Thursday: 11AM-12AM Friday: 11AM-1AM Saturday: 10AM-1AM Sunday: 10AM-11PM Clasico Italian Chophouse, located in the heart of Sarasota, is a vibrant dining spot that combines the taste of Italy with a modern twist. The menu showcases an inviting selection of Italian classics alongside contemporary favorites, making it an ideal destination for both locals and visitors. Guests often rave about the Chicken Parmesan, made with house-made pasta and a rich sauce that elevates this traditional dish. The restaurant's ambiance is enhanced by live music that creates a lively yet warm atmosphere, perfect for family dinners or romantic evenings out. With attentive staff, including noted servers like Dalton and Andrei, customer service is consistently praised, ensuring a memorable dining experience. The patio is dog-friendly, welcoming diners to enjoy their meals outdoors amidst the charm of downtown Sarasota. Clasico also impresses with its offerings of Osso Bucco and a kale salad that surprises even the pickiest eaters. Whether stopping by for a quick lunch or a leisurely dinner, Clasico Italian Chophouse promises delightful food paired with a genuine dining atmosphere. News & Marketing Tips FAQ Fridays Let's Connect Let's Connect October 16, 2023 Clasico Chophouse and Taproom adds new General Manager and  Executive Chef Clasico Chophouse and Taproom is pleased to announce the addition of Matt Kaess as General Manager and David Locke as Executive Chef. Kaess brings over 30 years of experience in the restaurant and hospitality industry to Clasico while Locke has been a chef for 10 years. Originally from Alabama, Kaess began his career in New York scooping ice cream. Kaess also worked as an Assistant Wine Buyer, Food and Beverage Manager and Executive Chef throughout his extensive career. He spent eight years as a Culinary Partner with PF Chang‚Äôs and was selected to be the opening Executive Chef for ‚Äúinternational‚Äù expansion in Puerto Rico where he opened two restaurants for the brand. Prior to joining Clasico, Kaess was the General Manager for a fine dining establishment in Orlando for the last three years. Locke hails from Gainesville and began his culinary career by watching cooking shows as a child with his grandmother, replicating the dishes they saw on TV in her kitchen. As he got older his family opened a BBQ restaurant in Auburndale. They participated in Florida‚Äôs competitive BBQ circuit which yielded numerous accolades, particularly in categories such as pulled pork, ribs, and the quintessential BBQ cut, brisket. Locke‚Äôs journey continued with time spent as a chef for the esteemed Levy Restaurants as well as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, Orlando Magic and Walt Disney World. ‚ÄúAdding Matt and David to the Clasico family is tremendous,‚Äù said Clasico Director of Operations Matt Goldstein. ‚ÄúThe experience and expertise they each bring to the table will be greatly beneficial to the growth and success of our restaurant.‚Äù Clasico Chophouse and Taproom is located at 775 Brandon Town Center Drive, Brandon. It is open Sunday-Thursday 11 a.m. to 9 p.m. and Friday-Saturday 11 a.m. until the last customer leaves. Discounts for military personnel are available. For more information on Clasico Chophouse and Taproom, please visit clasicobrandon.com or call 813-444-5188. About Clasico Chophouse and Taproom Where friends create classic memories. That‚Äôs Clasico Chophouse and Taproom. Focused on selecting each ingredient to provide an authentic and memorable culinary experience, Clasico Chophouse and Taproom offers a variety of America‚Äôs favorite foods including Italian-American and Central Texas barbeque. A sophisticated yet approachable dining experience, the atmosphere is also set for fun with a Taproom filled with TVs to enjoy sports, private rooms to celebrate special occasions, a 40-service craft beer tap wall, an outdoor terrace and games for all. Follow Clasico Chophouse and Taproom on Facebook or Instagram for the latest happenings. Share now!
